text: I was starting to worry you wouldn't wake up at all.
But you look stronger than ever, ready to head back to the factory.
Yes, I feel much better than before.
I didn't expect to recover from that fever so quickly.
I've been feeling sick myself, but I don't have the money for medicine from up TOP.
I don't think this old body of mine can take much more of it.
Only God knows if we'll see each other again when you return.
